languages.text: "Он им одержим, с первого дня его обнаружения он не покидал пост обслуживания, не отдыхал, почти не спал и постился, подпитываясь лишь конденсатом с охладительного контура реликвии и стимуляторами. Со временем начал получать "откровения", а затем "прозрел"... Или окончательно спятил. Его проповеди направлены на простолюдинов и призывают к смирению и милосердию. Он часто рассказывает о своем прошлом "житии", которое во многом сходится с общеизвестными легендами о святом Когнации. Анархических призывов и радикального отступления от Кредо в его речах не обнаружено. Пока что".

Анархических призывов и радикального отступления от Кредо в его речах не обнаружено. Пока что".

languages.text: "He became obsessed with it from the day it was discovered. He never left his maintenance post, never rested, barely ever slept, fasting and living off stimulants and condensate from the relic's cooling circuit. Then he started having 'revelations' and eventually 'saw the truth'... or he went completely insane. His sermons are directed at commoners, appealing to them for humility and mercy. He often speaks about his former life as a saint, and many of these tales match known legends about Saint Cognatius. No anarchical pronunciations or radical deviations from the Creed have been found in his words... yet."

traits.locale_text: "When the Crucible was discovered, he became obsessed with it — he toiled practically without sleep or rest, living off stimulants and corpse starch bran. Then he started having 'revelations' allegedly sent to him by Saint Cognatius, until he eventually realised his purpose. His sermons are directed at commoners, appealing to them for humility and mercy. He often speaks about his former life as a saint, and many of these tales match known legends about Saint Cognatius. No anarchical pronunciations or radical deviations from the Creed have been found in his words as of yet."

languages.text: “从熔炉被发现的那一天起，他就对它着了魔。他从来不离开他的维修岗位，从不休息，也几乎不睡觉，完全不进食，只靠兴奋剂和圣物冷却回路的冷凝水为生。然后他开始得到‘启示’，并最终‘看到了真相’……或者说，他是彻底疯了。他针对平民进行布道，呼吁他们谦卑、仁慈。他经常讲述他身为圣人的前世，其中许多故事与圣科尼亚蒂乌斯的已知传说相吻合。在他的话语中，并没有发现无政府主义的倾向或违背信条的激进宣传……目前为止是这样。”
languages.original_text: "He became obsessed with it from the day it was discovered. He never left his maintenance post, never rested, barely ever slept, fasting and living off stimulants and condensate from the relic's cooling circuit. Then he started having 'revelations' and eventually 'saw the truth'... or he went completely insane. His sermons are directed at commoners, appealing to them for humility and mercy. He often speaks about his former life as a saint, and many of these tales match known legends about Saint Cognatius. No anarchical pronunciations or radical deviations from the Creed have been found in his words... yet."

traits.locale_text: “从熔炉被发现的那一天起，他就对它着了魔。他从来不离开他的维修岗位，从不休息，也几乎不睡觉，完全不进食，只靠兴奋剂和圣物冷却回路的冷凝水为生。然后他开始得到‘启示’，并最终‘看到了真相’……或者说，他是彻底疯了。他针对平民进行布道，呼吁他们谦卑、仁慈。他经常讲述他身为圣人的前世，其中许多故事与圣科尼亚蒂乌斯的已知传说相吻合。在他的话语中，并没有发现无政府主义的倾向或违背信条的激进宣传……目前为止是这样。”

languages.text: «Se obsesionó con ella desde el día en que fue descubierta. Nunca abandonaba su puesto de mantenimiento, nunca descansaba, apenas dormía, ayunaba y vivía a base de estimulantes y condensado del circuito de refrigeración de la reliquia. Entonces empezó a tener "revelaciones" y finalmente "vio la verdad"... o se volvió completamente loco. Sus sermones se dirigen a los plebeyos, a los que pide humildad y misericordia. A menudo habla de su vida anterior como santo, y muchos de estos relatos coinciden con leyendas conocidas sobre san Cognatius. No se han encontrado en sus palabras pronunciaciones anárquicas ni desviaciones radicales del Credo... todavía».
languages.original_text: "He became obsessed with it from the day it was discovered. He never left his maintenance post, never rested, barely ever slept, fasting and living off stimulants and condensate from the relic's cooling circuit. Then he started having 'revelations' and eventually 'saw the truth'... or he went completely insane. His sermons are directed at commoners, appealing to them for humility and mercy. He often speaks about his former life as a saint, and many of these tales match known legends about Saint Cognatius. No anarchical pronunciations or radical deviations from the Creed have been found in his words... yet."

traits.locale_text: «Se obsesionó con ella desde el día en que fue descubierta. Nunca abandonaba su puesto de mantenimiento, nunca descansaba, apenas dormía, ayunaba y vivía a base de estimulantes y condensado del circuito de refrigeración de la reliquia. Entonces empezó a tener "revelaciones" y finalmente "vio la verdad"... o se volvió completamente loco. Sus sermones se dirigen a los plebeyos, a los que pide humildad y misericordia. A menudo habla de su vida anterior como santo, y muchos de estos relatos coinciden con leyendas conocidas sobre san Cognatius. No se han encontrado en sus palabras pronunciaciones anárquicas ni desviaciones radicales del Credo... todavía».

languages.text: 「発見されたその日から、彼は取りつかれたんだ。彼はメンテナンス担当を外れようとせず、休まず、ほとんど眠らず、絶食し、遺物の冷却回路から出る増強剤と凝縮水を摂取して生き永らえてたそうだ。そして、'啓示'が与えられ、やがて'真実を目にした'...まあ、完全に狂ってしまったってわけさ。彼の説教は一般の民に向けられ、民に謙遜と慈悲を訴えてるんだ。何かにつけ、彼は聖人としての前世について語り、その多くが聖コグナティウスに関する皆の知る伝説と一致している。彼の言葉には、無秩序な内容や信条集からの逸脱はないようだ...今のところは」
languages.original_text: "He became obsessed with it from the day it was discovered. He never left his maintenance post, never rested, barely ever slept, fasting and living off stimulants and condensate from the relic's cooling circuit. Then he started having 'revelations' and eventually 'saw the truth'... or he went completely insane. His sermons are directed at commoners, appealing to them for humility and mercy. He often speaks about his former life as a saint, and many of these tales match known legends about Saint Cognatius. No anarchical pronunciations or radical deviations from the Creed have been found in his words... yet."

traits.locale_text: 「発見されたその日から、彼は取りつかれたんだ。彼はメンテナンス担当を外れようとせず、休まず、ほとんど眠らず、絶食し、遺物の冷却回路から出る増強剤と凝縮水を摂取して生き永らえてたそうだ。そして、'啓示'が与えられ、やがて'真実を目にした'...まあ、完全に狂ってしまったってわけさ。彼の説教は一般の民に向けられ、民に謙遜と慈悲を訴えてるんだ。何かにつけ、彼は聖人としての前世について語り、その多くが聖コグナティウスに関する皆の知る伝説と一致している。彼の言葉には、無秩序な内容や信条集からの逸脱はないようだ...今のところは」

languages.text: « Dès le jour de sa découverte, c'est devenu pour lui une véritable obsession. Il ne quittait plus son poste de maintenance, ne se reposait jamais et dormait à peine, jeûnant et vivant de stimulants et de condensats extraits du circuit de refroidissement de la relique. Après quelque temps, il a commencé à avoir des "révélations" qui lui "montraient la vérité"... ou il est devenu complètement fou, c'est selon. Ses sermons s'adressent aux roturiers et les exhortent à l'humilité et à la miséricorde. Il relate souvent son ancienne vie de saint, et nombre de ces récits s'inspirent de légendes connues de Saint Cognatius. Ses paroles n'ont trahi aucune inclination anarchique ou défiance manifeste vis-à-vis du Crédo... pour le moment. »
languages.original_text: "He became obsessed with it from the day it was discovered. He never left his maintenance post, never rested, barely ever slept, fasting and living off stimulants and condensate from the relic's cooling circuit. Then he started having 'revelations' and eventually 'saw the truth'... or he went completely insane. His sermons are directed at commoners, appealing to them for humility and mercy. He often speaks about his former life as a saint, and many of these tales match known legends about Saint Cognatius. No anarchical pronunciations or radical deviations from the Creed have been found in his words... yet."

Ses paroles n'ont trahi aucune inclination anarchique ou défiance manifeste vis-à-vis du Crédo... pour le moment. »

languages.text: "Er war besessen davon, ab dem Tag, an dem er entdeckt wurde. Er verließ seinen Posten nie, ruhte sich nie aus, schlief kaum, fastete und lebte nur von Stimulanzien und Kondensat aus den Kühlkreisen der Reliquie. Dann fing er an, 'Offenbarungen' zu erleben, und schließlich 'die Wahrheit zu sehen' ... oder er hat vollkommen den Verstand verloren. Seine Predigten sind an den Pöbel gerichtet, er appelliert an die Leute, demütig und gnädig zu sein. Oft spricht er von seinem früheren Leben als Heiliger, und viele dieser Geschichten entsprechen bekannten Legenden über St. Cognatius. In seinen Worten sind keine anarchischen Verkündigungen oder radikalen Abweichungen vom Glauben zu entdecken ... bisher zumindest."
languages.original_text: "He became obsessed with it from the day it was discovered. No anarchical pronunciations or radical deviations from the Creed have been found in his words... yet."

languages.text: "Keşfedildiği günden beri onu takıntı hâline getirmişti. Bakım mevkisini asla terk etmedi, asla dinlenmek bilmedi, nadiren uyudu, oruç tutup uyarıcılarla ve yadigârın soğutma devresindeki kondansatörlerle hayatını sürdürdü. Ardından 'vahiyler' almaya başladı ve en nihayetinde 'hakikati gördü' ya da... Tamamen aklını kaçırdı. Vaazlarını sıradan yurttaşlara yönelterek tevazu ve merhamet çağrısında bulunuyor. Sıklıkla bir aziz olarak yaşadığı eski hayatından bahsediyor. Bu hikâyelerin büyük bir kısmı, Aziz Cognatius hakkında bilinen efsanelerle uyuşuyor. Sözlerinde İtikat'ın anarşik söylemleri ya da radikal sapkınlıklarına rastlanmadı. Henüz..."
languages.original_text: "He became obsessed with it from the day it was discovered. He never left his maintenance post, never rested, barely ever slept, fasting and living off stimulants and condensate from the relic's cooling circuit. Then he started having 'revelations' and eventually 'saw the truth'... or he went completely insane. His sermons are directed at commoners, appealing to them for humility and mercy. He often speaks about his former life as a saint, and many of these tales match known legends about Saint Cognatius. No anarchical pronunciations or radical deviations from the Creed have been found in his words... yet."
